data.text: @oakayla Both fantastic choices — hope y’all have an awesome weekend up through Mardi Gras! We’ve been blaring Dr. John, Irma Thomas, and Trombone Shorty for the past few days. Brass bands and Marcia Ball are up next.
@JeffHaynes99 i had abitas strawberry lager! we’re usually holy roller people tbh. enjoy your mardi gras beans!!!
@MsBooogie thank you!!! it’s my favorite time of the year 😩😩😩
@oakayla Are you going to have Abita or Dixie at the boil? I’m picking up some Purple Haze and Turbodog for our red beans on Tuesday, but that boil looks fantastic!

@oakayla I don’t particularly like boils but if a table had a long mound of food that I DID like I’d lose my fucking mind

that’s to say congrats and enjoy bc I can’t imagine 🤤
also my friends threw me a karaoke bachelorette thing at a dad bar last night and i haven’t had this much fun in so long 😭😭 https://t.co/0K0R69duHB
